headline: MOISTTECH NEAR INFRARED ONLINE MOISTURE SENSOR
description: Instant Non-Contact Near Infrared Moisture Sensor Transmitter -- New Never Used
categories.lvl2: Inspection Equipment  >  Optical Inspection Equipment > Other Optical Inspection
specstable:
Manufacturer MoistTech Corp
Model IR 3000
Description Moisture Sensor -- Near Infrared
Other Information NB: System can be reconfigured for different applications and moisture percentage measurement and accuracy.

Current Configuration
Material: Powder
Moisture Range: 0-10%
Accuracy: .1%
Filter Band: 2.2/1.9/1.8
Snorkel Sampler with solenoid valve
Model 0590 remote digital panel meter
CD with software and manuals

Power Input: 90-250V, 50/60 HZ
Extended Description Details at MoistTech IR3000 Configuration Detail_.pdf
